column1: Local Foods////Love Local Foods! Situated across the street from 24 hour fitness
column2: Local Foods offers a variety of salads
column4: and occasionally great plates that are perfect for a wide variety of casual yet upscale eating in Rice Village. Tonight I had the special of the day
column5: which was a delicious water buffalo meatloaf served atop veggies. Definitely highly recommend Local Foods whether you're looking for a post workout meal
column6: or if you're looking for a nice casual lunch or dinner!
